item.description:
Hey guys! We've been busy having a great summer and enjoying the gorgeous weather! We've been swimming, digging in the sand, having BBQ picnics, playing Summer Camp games & winning prizes. We hope you've had a good time too. Now it's time to start thinking about all the fun we have with our friends when we go Back to School. Come join us tomorrow from 11:00am-1:00pm for a Back to School Orientation! You will have a chance to meet new friends and counselors and maybe even learn a thing or two! Can't wait to see you all there!

Love & puppy kisses,

Auntie Becky & Auntie Kayla
item.name: Back to School
